ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T01:53:54 [Issue ID 4000-154658] urn:comicvine:4000-154658 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 14:06:12. [Issue ID 305306]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The turtles, Casey and Shadow are all to eager to protect April from the attacking Foot Soldiers just like old times. After a while the Utroms break up the battle and clarify that they had detected nanobots within April's body.
Upon medical examination the Utroms identify the nanobots as ones they used during their first stay on Earth and stolen by Baxter Stockman. The turtles and Casey theorise that this is what Stockman injected her with during their previous encounter with him.
Meanwhile back in Northampton Shadow's boyfriend Jay uses the scope on his rifle to get a glimpse of Shadow's mysterious grandfather and shocked to see that he's a giant rat. He is then attacked by an angry Metalhead and Steve Steel.
Also contains the Gizmo story " A Few Small Repairs " by Michael Dooney
